claim: Flublok is produced using a novel production platform in which recombinant HA is expressed in insect cells using a baculovirus expression vector system (BEVS).
explanation: The image shows the header section of a journal article from Vaccine (Elsevier), including the journal title, Elsevier logo, journal homepage URL, and a partially visible article title beneath a thick rule line. The image only displays the journal header and article title fragment and does not mention Flublok, recombinant HA expression, insect cells, or BEVS; it does not support the claim. Note: Limited content visible; image appears to be only the page header without details on vaccine production methods.
